Baffle Ceiling

Quote

Baffle suspended ceiling systems are decorative products that provide design freedom. They are preferred in architectural solutions by combining aesthetics and functionality. Due to their versatility, they have a wide range of applications across various sectors and can be used in both indoor and outdoor spaces. Baffle suspended ceiling systems can be utilized in offices, workspaces, shopping malls, stores, restaurants, cafes, airports, train stations, metro stations, concert halls, theaters, conference rooms, hotels, and many other areas. They enhance the decorative appearance of a space without reducing its volume.

Features of Clipped Bent Baffle Ceiling System:

  • Baffle suspended ceiling profiles can be manufactured using galvanized steel or aluminum, with a minimum width of 20 mm and heights ranging from 30 to 300 mm.
  • Installation and, when necessary, disassembly are easy with the special spring-clipped carrier. (Our special spring-clipped carrier is protected by patent number TR 2021 014785 Y.)
  • The spring carrier dampens vibrations and oscillations, increasing safety during disasters such as earthquakes and fires.
  • Perforations can be applied to baffle profiles based on acoustic requirements. Acoustic fabric and/or glass wool/rock wool can be incorporated inside.
  • The baffle ceiling system can be produced with the desired spacing between axes.
  • Standard colors are RAL 9016, 9005, and 7016. Other RAL colors or wood-look finishes are also available upon request.
Specification Drawing Data Sheet TDS

Extruded Baffle Ceiling

Quote

Extruded Baffle systems are decorative suspended ceiling solutions that offer design freedom. They are preferred in architectural applications by combining aesthetics and functionality. With their versatility, they have a wide range of uses across various sectors and can be applied in both indoor and outdoor environments. These systems can be utilized in offices, workspaces, shopping malls, stores, restaurants, cafes, airports, train stations, metro stations, concert halls, theaters, conference rooms, hotels, and many other areas. They provide a decorative appearance without reducing the volume of the space.

Features of Extruded Baffle:

  • Aluminum profiles can be produced in standard rectangular sizes of 30×100 mm, 50×100 mm, 30×150 mm, 50×150 mm, or in tubular shapes with diameters of 50 mm or 75 mm, or in custom cross-sections up to 6 meters in length.
  • The 10 mm spaced holes on the PROSİSTA Z carrier profiles allow for installation at any desired axial spacing.
  • They can be electrostatically powder-coated in any RAL color or finished with a wood-look transfer coating.
  • If slotted Z carriers are used, they facilitate easy installation and disassembly, providing quick access to utilities.

Vectoral Baffle Ceiling

Quote

Vectoral Baffle Ceilings feature a pendant design. This characteristic breaks the flat and plain appearance of the ceiling, adding aesthetic and functional variety to the space's design. When used in high-ceiling environments, it reduces the perceived overall dimensions of the space, creating a warmer and more inviting atmosphere. Particularly preferred in cafes, shopping malls, and similar venues, it provides a modern appearance and ambiance.

Features of Vectoral Baffle Ceilings:

  • Vectoral Baffle Ceilings can be manufactured in various sizes and dimensions using aluminum or galvanized steel.
  • Vectoral Baffle Ceilings profiles are locked into a clipped carrier system connected to the L carrier profile.
  • Easy to install and disassemble.
  • Standard colors are RAL 9016, 9005, and 7016. Other RAL colors or wood-look finishes are available upon request.

Wall Baffle

Quote

Wall baffle ceiling systems are a design solution that offers design freedom and stands out as a decorative product. Thanks to its concealed carrier system, this system can be used on walls without visible carriers. This feature provides a clean and elegant aesthetic appearance. It can also be used as a separator in projects when desired. It is a special wall solution designed to bring the aesthetic appeal of ceilings to walls.

Wall baffle systems can be preferred in offices, workspaces, shopping malls, stores, restaurants, cafes, airports, train stations, metro stations, concert halls, theaters, conference rooms, hotels, and many other areas.

Features of Wall Baffle System:

  • Wall baffle profiles can be manufactured using galvanized steel or aluminum, with a minimum width of 20 mm and heights ranging from 30 to 300 mm.
  • Can be produced in any desired size, length, and color.
  • Integrated solutions with decorative lighting can be implemented.
  • Contributes to the acoustics of the environment.
  • Baffle panels can be installed with customizable axial spacing based on the project and can be produced as perforated, non-perforated, with or without acoustic fabric, or filled with glass wool or rock wool.
  • Wall baffle system with easy installation using the PROSİSTA special concealed carrier.
  • Standard colors are RAL 9016, 9005, and 7016. Other RAL colors or wood-look finishes are available upon request.




Specification Drawing Data Sheet TDS

Multipanel Ceiling

Quote

Multipanel ceiling systems are products with a wide range of applications, offering unique design flexibility, functionality, and aesthetically rich solutions. This system is created by combining linear panels of varying widths and depths, consisting of carriers suspended on the horizontal axis and U-shaped bent panels attached to the carriers on the vertical axis. When used in large spaces such as wide corridors, airport terminals, shopping malls, and large offices, it provides an excellent aesthetic appearance.

Features of Multipanel Ceiling System:

  • Multipanel ceilings can be manufactured in various sizes using aluminum or galvanized steel.
  • Panels are mounted by locking onto a clipped carrier.
  • Different gap alternatives between panels are possible.
  • Provides a multilayered aesthetic appearance for various design and acoustic needs.
  • Can be perforated.
  • Standard colors are RAL 9016, 9005, 7016, and wood-look finishes are available.




Specification Drawing Data Sheet TDS

Self Carrying Open Cell Ceiling

Quote

Self-Carrying Open Cell Ceilings, combining elegant design with superior functionality, are an essential element of modern architecture. They offer unique solutions in various projects such as offices, hotels, shopping malls, and art galleries. This ceiling system does not require an additional carrier structure. It partially covers the original ceiling, creating a decorative appearance while allowing the desired amount of the ceiling to remain visible.

Features of Self-Carrying Open Cell Ceilings:

  • Easy to access, can be comfortably removed and reinstalled.
  • Does not obstruct air circulation.
  • Packaged in a disassembled state, making storage and transportation easy and cost-effective.
  • Being self-carrying, it provides a seamless, monolithic appearance on the ceiling.
  • Can be produced in cell sizes of 50×50, 60×60, 75×75, 86×86, 100×100, 120×120, 150×150, 200×200, 300×300, or custom dimensions.
  • Standard colors are RAL 9016, 9005, and 7016. Other RAL colors or wood-look finishes are available upon request.

Quote

Pyramid Open Cell Ceiling

Quote

Pyramid Open Cell ceilings add a modern and stylish ambiance to interior spaces with various design and color options. They also enhance sound insulation, providing noise control. They are particularly significant in high-noise environments such as offices, conference rooms, and restaurants.

Features of Pyramid Open Cell Ceiling System:

  • The self-carrying Pyramid Open Cell ceiling system offers a bold alternative to standard appearances.
  • Contributes to acoustic performance through perforations and a triangular form that widens towards the back.
  • Easy to access, can be comfortably removed and reinstalled.
  • Does not obstruct air circulation.
  • Packaged in a disassembled state, making storage and transportation economical.
  • Can be produced in cell sizes of 150×150, 200×200, and 300×300, or in custom dimensions.
  • Standard colors are RAL 9016, 9005, and 7016. Other RAL colors or wood-look finishes are available upon request.

Lamina Open Cell Ceiling

Quote

Lamina Open Cell ceilings are products that stand out for their perfect blend of aesthetic design and acoustic performance. These ceilings provide effective sound insulation, isolating the environment from noise, while also creating a visually appealing atmosphere.

Features of Lamina Open Cell Ceiling System:

  • Made from aluminum or galvanized steel, Lamina Open Cell stands out for its elegant and aesthetic appeal.
  • A ceiling system with a high ability to create a dense grid on the ceiling, concealing the background.
  • Its modular system and openable panel feature provide easy access and intervention to the ceiling background.
  • Does not obstruct air circulation.
  • Can be perforated.
  • Standard colors are RAL 9016, 9005, and 7016. Other RAL colors are available upon request.

Lay In Mesh Ceiling

Quote

Features of Lay-In Mesh Suspended Ceiling System:

  • Lay-in panels are dangled by hanging them 8 mm or 12 mm from T24 and T15 carriers.
  • Available in various pitches and mesh opening sizes
  • Can be painted in any desired RAL color using electrostatic powder coating.
  • A seamless appearance can be achieved by welding the profile from below.
  • Acoustic fabric can be applied to the flattened/ironed mesh option.
  • The “Z” profile used at the edges conceals cut plates, creating a jointed ceiling appearance.
  • Available in standard sizes of 600x600mm, 600x1200mm, or custom sizes, and can be manufactured from galvanized steel or aluminum based on preference.

Acoustic Glass Wool Baffle

Quote

Acoustic Glass Wool Baffles are acoustic regulation panels that provide sound insulation while offering an elegant appearance. These panels are used to address issues such as reverberation, echo, and sound absorption in various environments. With their sound-blocking properties, they absorb sound waves, reducing reflected sound energy. When used with a proper placement plan and sufficient Acoustic Glass Wool Baffles, they maximize the noise reduction coefficient, offering an effective solution. They are ideal for libraries, cafes, open offices, restaurants, meeting rooms, airports, gyms, shopping malls, exhibition centers, conference halls, amphitheaters, cafeterias, and many other spaces. Acoustic Glass Wool Baffles can also be applied to walls with decorative, colorful, and varied model options. Since it is applied by hanging it on the ceiling, it adds depth to the space and increases aesthetics.

Features of Acoustic Glass Wool Baffle System:

  • Acoustic panels are formed by reinforcing the edges of glass wool panels, which vary in thickness from 20 mm to 100 mm, and covering them with fabric or glass mesh.
  • Floating panels provide a controlled sound distribution while ensuring a linear integrity on the ceilings at the same time.
  • The panels meet acoustic performance expectations with an NRC 0,80-1,00 range.
  • The desired colors can also be produced specifically for the Project






Specification Drawing Data Sheet TDS

Acoustic Glass Wool Canopy

Quote

Acoustic glass wool canopy systems are used in workplaces, shopping malls, gyms, meeting rooms, libraries, call centers, and factories where acoustic issues are present. The system facilitates communication in a comfortable environment. In such spaces, it is crucial for reducing intense sound absorption and creating a more comfortable working environment. Available in various sizes, shapes, and colors, these options provide solutions tailored to the specific design needs of the space.

Features of Acoustic Glass Wool Canopy System:

  • Horizontal acoustic panels are created by reinforcing the four edges of glass wool panels, ranging from 40 mm to 100 mm in thickness, and covering them with fabric or glass mesh.

  • With an NRC range of 0.80-1.00, these panels meet acoustic performance expectations.

Glass Wool Ceiling Panels

Quote

Acoustic glass wool ceiling panels provide solutions for sound control in indoor environments. T24 Carrier System

Quote

Features of T24 Carrier System:

  • T24 carrier profiles undergo bending tests according to TSE - EN 13964 standard, and the deflection is less than 0.2 mm, thus complying with TSE EN norms.
  • The locking system is specially designed.
  • With special fire expansion gaps, the expanding structure prevents system collapse during a potential fire and ensures stability of the carrier system at high temperatures.
  • Standard colors include RAL 9016 White, RAL 9005 Black, and RAL 7016 Anthracite Grey, or they can be painted in any desired RAL color. A wood-look option is also available.




Specification Drawing Data Sheet TDS

Vinyl Acoustic Panel

Quote

Vinyl Laminated Acoustic Gypsum Panel Features:

  • Available in standard panel sizes of 600×600 mm, 600×1200 mm, or custom dimensions, with perforation and color options.
  • Can be 8 mm, 9.5 mm, or 12.5 mm in thickness.
  • Can be chosen with vinyl coating, painted, or with an acoustic fabric backing.

seo.meta_description_en: With our slogan “Embrace Change,” we continue to grow every day. PROSİSTA, with its many years of experience in the industry, is one of Turkey’s leading manufacturers of suspended ceilings. products.full_description_ro:
Panourile acustice placate cu vinil combina rezistenta suprafetei la curatare cu performanta acustica, fiind potrivite pentru spatii tehnice si medicale. Sunt utilizate in spitale, clinici, sali de tratament, laboratoare, spatii alimentare si zone unde igiena si acustica sunt importante.

Caracteristici:
- Suprafata din vinil, usor de curatat si rezistenta
- Nucleu cu proprietati acustice pentru reducerea reverberatiei
- Montaj modular pentru acces la utilitati

Gypsum Board Profiles

Quote

It includes load-bearing profiles, corner profiles, special detail profiles, and accessories used in gypsum board suspended ceiling and partition wall systems. Custom lengths and desired cross-sections can be manufactured according to project specifications.

Sistemul include profile portante, profile de colt, accesorii de detaliu si elemente speciale necesare pentru realizarea sistemelor din gips-carton. Componentele pot fi fabricate conform specificatiilor proiectului.

Caracteristici:
- Profile portante si de rigidizare pentru structuri din gips-carton
- Profile de colt si accesorii pentru finisaje precise
- Elemente speciale disponibile la cerere, in functie de proiect
